name: BASH Games
description:
BASH Games is a game where you only get to use your keyboard and a set of strict instruction and commands to move and do things throughout the entire game, you'll also have a bot helper to tell you about the commands and functions you can use in the game.

BASH Games is still in development, this is just a prototype to test out the game idea and how fun it is according to the its players, The game only has one internal game, and I'm willing to add more in game games that only get played with commands

You can help me in this project by leaving a comment with your opinion, and/or making a donation to help me keep going and finish this game entirely.
